IDs with spaces are not valid per HTML5 spec. The anchor syntax should not match, treating the text as literal content.

[[my section id]]

Section with Space in Anchor

This section’s anchor has spaces, so it should NOT be parsed as an anchor. Instead, the [[…​]] should become literal text in the preamble.

[#another space id]

Section with Space in Shorthand

Same behavior for shorthand syntax with spaces.

Valid ID Section

This section has a valid ID without spaces.
